project.title: Acacia PMI - Patient labels, deceased details, audit details
project.description: This video explains how to print a patient label showing their episode details, how to view a deceased patient’s time, date and location of death, and how to view changes made to a patient record in the “audit details” section. This video shows how to check who made the changes, when the changes were made, and what the changes were. It also shows how to check who has viewed or opened a patient’s record, even if they did not make any changes.
